entry.title: Burning House
entry.summary:
Author: Yes_I_have_daddy_issues

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,078Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 62

Summary: We were kids together, growing up in the same crime ridden alleyways and neighborhoods, just two doors down the road from each other. “I’ll find a way.” he turned back to face me, a big smile stretching across his face, one I would never forget, the light in his eyes visible.I never saw Jason again after that night. Not in person at least.On the news, getting adopted by Bruce Wayne of all people, waving and smiling to the cameras, it never reached his eyes the way his smile always did when we were younger.Then he vanished for good.

entry.title: The House hunger built
entry.summary:
Author: FearTheHime

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 74,947Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 484

Summary: "Of course I eat people, I mean...It's not something I would broadcast since it's...well Gotham and they began to make a phad about it because the citizens are brilliantly...stupid."Bodies are piling up, whatever is left. Families; different backgrounds, different ethnics, religions, looks are being eaten and whatever is left into a master piece. Some sort of art with the remains and everyone was losing time and leads to find out who has been feasting upon Gotham citizens. Jason however, knew of a Cannibal that he totally never mentioned to Bruce. It's not Jason's fault he died before revealing his darkest discovery and that discovery is in the form of a boy he had left behind. [M/N] [L/N]; Mortitan, brilliant, a chef of his own making and conisear of flesh.All Jason needed to do is sweeten the deal in a way that drives all people, after all at the end of the day {M/N] is human after all."Besides..it's people...they are literally born every day..so who cares if a few of them...just disapear once in a while?"

entry.title: Threads of Red
entry.summary:
Author: ddottodd

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,668Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 25

Summary: She’s the girl Gotham calls the “smiling, always positive nurse.” He’s the brooding vigilante in red, moving through the city’s shadows.When disaster strikes their worlds collide, he rescues, she heals. She tends to the frightened and injured, he fights to keep them alive.Two very different kinds of heroism. Two very different kinds of people. And somewhere between smoke, sirens, and the chaos of Gotham, something unspoken begins to grow.Can the girl who gives hope to everyone she meets reach the boy who trusts no one?

entry.title: Dear, Our Bleeding Hearts
entry.summary:
Author: Goshidori

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,856Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 4

Summary: A story. Isn't that what everyone wants? A story with a hero that has cool powers, someone that can swoop in and save the day. A story where everything turns out alright, where the bad guys get taken down, and the world is saved. That would be a beautiful story, wouldn't it? But that isn't this story. There is no hero, there are no lifelong friends that save the day, because people can't be trusted. No one can save you, but you. To rely on others to pull you from the depths of despair is foolish and naive, that was a lesson learned long ago. But you're already here, aren't you? So I suppose I can tell you this story, and let you learn for yourself just how cruel people can be. So, let's start from the beginning. [Gender-Neutral Reader, this story is for everyone!]
